Method Detail

put

public static void put(java.lang.String key,
                       java.lang.String value,
                       OutputData output)
Adds a key value pair to a map in the OutputData that system form uses to print global fields. In global data under SYSTEM_FORM_STATE is map of all the key value pairs that are printed to every system form. Every component can add values to that map. This is a convenience method for adding values without checking for the existence of the map in the OutputData.

Parameters:
key - the key of the value.
value - the value under the key.
output - OutputData that will be enriched with the map.
